channel.title: Multivariate Analysis on Zihan Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Multivariate Analysis on Zihan Huang

item.title: Project II: Chronic Kidney Disease Case Study
item.description: Date: January 2022 - March 2022 This is a course project on my STAT-630 Multivariate Analysis class, instructed by Dr. Matthew Schneider. The project was from the University of Virginia Darden College of Business. The project aims to perform multivariate analysis methods on the chronic kidney disease cases to understand the factors influencing whether a patient has such disease, and build predictive models to predictive CKD cases. For the first part of the project, we used principal component analysis, factor analysis and cluster analysis to identify the key identifiers causing CKD.
